alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Northwest Plateau; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 22 at 11:45AM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Turning west this evening and decreasing to 20 to 30 mph with occasional gusts to 50 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau, Curry County, Roosevelt County, De Baca County and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight MDT Friday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Northwest Plateau; Roosevelt County
